skill.name: theme-factory
skill.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
skill.summary: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML la...
skill.author: 7Spade

security_audit.summary: Prompt-based skill containing only documentation and theme definitions. No executable code, network calls, or file system access beyond reading theme files. Behavior matches stated purpose.

content.user_title: Apply professional themes to presentations and documents
content.value_statement: Creating consistent, professional visual designs takes time and design expertise. This skill provides 10 curated color and font themes that can be applied instantly to slides, documents, reports, and web pages. Custom themes can also be generated based on your requirements.
actual_capabilities: Apply 10 pre-designed professional themes to any artifact
Generate custom themes based on your description or requirements
Access complete color palettes with hex codes for each theme
Get font pairings for headers and body text
Display visual theme showcase for selection
Ensure proper contrast and readability when applying themes
limitations: Does not modify actual files - provides specifications only
Themes are text-based specifications, not CSS or template files
Actual implementation depends on the artifact creation tool
No preview generation or live editing capabilities

use_cases.title: Corporate presentation styling
use_cases.description: Apply Ocean Depths or Modern Minimalist theme to create polished, professional slides for clients and stakeholders.

use_cases.title: Brand-consistent documents
use_cases.description: Maintain visual consistency across reports, proposals, and marketing materials using curated color and font combinations.

use_cases.title: Rapid prototyping support
use_cases.description: Quickly apply professional themes to prototype designs or generate theme specifications for implementation.

prompt_templates.title: Apply existing theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the Ocean Depths theme to my presentation deck. Use Deep Navy for backgrounds, Teal for accents, Seafoam for highlights, and Cream for text.

prompt_templates.title: Generate custom theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a custom theme for a coffee shop brand. The colors should feel warm, earthy, and inviting with a modern touch.

prompt_templates.title: Style document type
prompt_templates.prompt: Create and apply a professional theme for my quarterly business report. The theme should convey trust, clarity, and competence.

prompt_templates.title: Adapt existing theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the Tech Innovation theme as a base but adjust the colors to match a healthcare technology company. Keep the bold, modern feel but add clinical accuracy.

output_examples.input: Apply the Forest Canopy theme to my environmental sustainability presentation.
output: Best For: Environmental presentations, sustainability reports, outdoor brands, wellness content, organic products

best_practices: Start by displaying the theme showcase to let users preview all available options before making a selection
Confirm theme selection explicitly before applying to ensure user intent is met
Apply colors consistently across all elements including backgrounds, text, accents, and borders
anti_patterns: Applying multiple themes simultaneously without user approval
Ignoring the theme's intended use cases when selecting for inappropriate contexts
Modifying the theme specifications without documenting changes

faq.question: What platforms support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for styling any presentation, document, or design artifact.

faq.question: How many themes are included?
faq.answer: Ten professionally designed themes are included covering styles from corporate to creative, nature to technology.

faq.question: Can I create custom themes?
faq.answer: Yes, describe your vision and the skill will generate a custom theme with appropriate colors and fonts.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill only reads theme definitions and provides color/font specifications. No data is stored or transmitted.

faq.question: Why are my colors not applying?
faq.answer: The skill provides specifications only. Your presentation tool must support custom colors or the theme must be implemented.

faq.question: How is this different from CSS frameworks?
faq.answer: This skill provides high-level theme specifications rather than implementation code. It works across any tool that accepts hex colors and font names.
